title: WHEREAS a programme of vaccinations for active immunisation to prevent
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Exempted
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Exempted 

Traveller) (Covid-19) (Amendment) (No. 11) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (exempted traveller) (covid-19) (amendment) (no 11) regulation 2021

title: WHEREAS a programme of vaccinations for active immunisation to prevent
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Exempted Traveller) (Covid-19) Regulations
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Exempted Traveller) (Covid-19) Regulations 
2021 (S.I. No. 134 of 2021) are amended by the insertion of the following 
Regulation after Regulation 24: 

“25. For the purposes of paragraph (j) of the definition of “exempted 
traveller” in section 38B(25) of the Act of 1947, a person is prescribed 
as an exempted traveller where the person arrives in the State on or 
after the 22nd day of September 2021.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th October, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [506] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 October, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [506]

title: WHEREAS a programme of vaccinations for active immunisation to prevent
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations made under Sections 5 and 38G (inserted by section 7 of the Health (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 1 of 2021)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947) amend the regulations set out in SI 134 of 2021 to prescribe certain additional persons as exempted in that regard.
